title: Small Business Meat Producer and Marketer Protection Act of 1993
content: Small Business Meat Producer and Marketer Protection Act of 1993 - Amends the Small Business Act to change the loan eligibility requirements for certain small businesses. Defines meatpacker or meat marketer engaged in commerce. Imposes limits on the slaughter, sale, purchase, and forward delivery of certain livestock by meatpackers or meat marketers engaged in commerce. Establishes fines for violations of this Act.
